controller.interfaces

Interface IControllerArtworkForm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerArtworkForm

    public interface IControllerArtworkForm
    The interface for the ControllerArtworkForm.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commandConfirm(java.lang.Long code, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author, boolean isAC, boolean isDC, int year, boolean isPaint, java.lang.String artD, java.lang.String techn, double height, double width, double depth, java.lang.String descr, ArtworkForm form)
      Checks the accuracy of the form fields and saves the information of the artwork in the model and in the view.

    • Method Detail

      • commandConfirm

        void commandConfirm(java.lang.Long code,
                    java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String author,
                    boolean isAC,
                    boolean isDC,
                    int year,
                    boolean isPaint,
                    java.lang.String artD,
                    java.lang.String techn,
                    double height,
                    double width,
                    double depth,
                    java.lang.String descr,
                    ArtworkForm form)
        Checks the accuracy of the form fields and saves the information of the artwork in the model and in the view. Show an error message if the fields are incorrect.
        Parameters:
        code - the code of the artwork.
        title - the title of the artwork.
        author - the author of the artwork.
        isAC - true if was selected "Avanti Cristo" otherwise false.
        isDC - true if was selected "Dopo Cristo" otherwiese false.
        year - the year of the artwork.
        isPaint - true if was selected "Pittura".
        artD - the type of artistic discipline of the artwork.
        techn - the painting technique or material of the artwork.
        height - the height of artwork.
        width - the width of artwork.
        depth - the depth of artwork.
        descr - the description of artwork.
        form - the current active form.
